title: I’m A Celebrity star Amy Willerton expecting first child with fiance Daniel Day
text:
Amy made fiance Daniel propose twice after he got down on both knees the first time (Picture: Brian To/WENN.com)

I’m A Celeb star Amy Willerton announced that she is expecting her first child with fiancé Daniel Day.

The former Miss Universe Great Britain winner told Hello! Magazine: ‘The baby was conceived not long after we got engaged in March.

‘It’s definitely the most wonderful engagement present we could ever wish for.’

The 27-year-old might be postponing their wedding until the arrival of their baby as they ‘want to get it right’.

‘Our wedding is about telling our friends and family that we want to be together forever and what counts is that our little baby will be with us,’ she said. ‘That’s really special.’

Amy is already five months pregnant and kept the news of her pregnancy a secret as she wanted to check that her baby was healthy.

Advertisement

She underwent an amniocentesis, which checks the full spectrum of any chromosomal and genetic conditions.

Amy waited several months to share the news (Picture: Hello! Magazine/PA)

Amy wanted to find out because her brother Ross, 25, was born with an extra chromosome and a form of autism called mosaicism.

Now that she got the OK, she and Daniel were excited to share the news.

Daniel, Amy’s partner of five years, proposed on a mountaintop in Switzerland at sunrise, but he dropped to both knees so she made him do it again.

That’s organised love.

Her and her fiance appear on the latest issue of Hello! (Picture: Hello! magazine/PA)

‘I was all set to do some extreme skiing,’ Amy told Hello! at the time. ‘Then I spied a breakfast picnic set up with candles, a firepit, a bottle of our favourite champagne and red roses everywhere.

‘Then he dropped to both knees and pulled out a box from his pocket containing the most beautiful ring. It felt like a dream.

‘And the second time around I made him do it on one knee because I didn’t know if proposing on both knees counted.’

Daniel, of course, proposed a second time properly.

He said: ‘I couldn’t have asked for it to go better. She’s like Sherlock Holmes – you can’t get anything by her.’

‘Now it does feel like the next chapter,’ Amy continued.

The full interview is available in Hello magazine, out now.
